response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to us. However, I understand the importance of negotiation in business transactions. Therefore, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving of $300,000 compared to our standard pricing, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
